ratings.comment: Horrible attitude, acts like she is pristine perfect and does no wrong. But literally the worst spirited teacher I have ever met. Stay at a distance.

Adrienne is super cool. There were a few class periods where her clarity wasn't perfect. Typically, she's incredibly easy to learn from and very insightful as far as English derivatives of Latin words are concerned. She often sends tidbits of helpful info in emails, as well as other cool stuff. She's also easygoing and patient. Simply awesome.

Adrienne was my TA for this class, and she made the experience 10x more amazing than it would have been without her. She was interested in the topic, and got along well with our entire discussion section. She knew how to relate the subject matter to our everyday college life. Plus she's pretty so...

Adrienne is simply a phenomenal teacher. Not having any previous exposure to Latin before taking this class, she did a great job introducing the language to me. Just a natural teacher, very approachable, and extremely likable.
She is an incredibly gifted and understanding teacher.  All of her activities and homework are useful to the student.  She comes across shy at first, but she's the sweetest teacher I have ever met.
